newsitem.title: UK: LIFFE white sugar ends thin session firmer.
newsitem.headline: LIFFE white sugar ends thin session firmer.

text.p: LIFFE white sugar futures ended narrowly firmer on Thursday after a listless session.
Activity was subdued with a total trading volume of 969 lots, mainly due to the Ascension Day holiday across Europe and subdued business in New York raws.
The front-month August white sugar contract ended 80 cents up at $312.50 a tonne, while the second-month October gained 20 cents to $303.40.
Ranges were tight throughout the session while attracting some limited interest, dealers said.
